description.@value: 50 grams of butter, cut into small pieces

ingredients.@value: 50 grams of butter, cut into small pieces

recipeInstructions.@value:
Carefully cook the duck breasts in order to render the fat until pink inside. Boil the creme de cassis in a saucepan until reduced by 1/3. Remove from
            heat, and stir in the butter in small pieces. Slice the duck breast and arrange on plates. Drizzle with sauce. Serve warm with celery root puree and roasted figs. Garnish with fresh
            parsley.
